name: Vivi Go
description:
Thanks to playing Vivi - GO!

Vivi is a little cute girl running errands.

Can Vivi go to her grandmother to avoid bad dogs?

-----------------------------------------------------

Controls

W,A,S,D or ↑,↓,←,→ : Move

Space Bar : Reroll

-----------------------------------------------------
